interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/05/24
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Redford'], 'Producers': ['Jake Eberts', 'Robert Redford', 'Michael Nozik'], 'Starring': ['Will Smith', 'Matt Damon', 'Charlize Theron'], 'Studio': ['PARAMOUNT PICTURES']}
Review Text: I LOVED this movie! I don't really understand the person who said it was "overrated." For someone to feel this is overrated probably isn't able to enjoy the subtleties often found in good writing.
Review Title: I LOVED this movie
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
